entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , New Carlisle
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: New Carlisle 11:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -11.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -16.2°C
Wind: WNW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending early in the morning then clearing. Local blowing snow. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 70 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
